description:
Voltaren Emulgel with No Mess Applicator for temporary relief of local pain and inflammation.

Voltaren Emulgel with No Mess Applicator is ideal for the temporary relief of local pain and inflammation.

What this medicine is used for:
For the temporary relief of local pain and inflammation in acute soft tissue injuries, including sprains, strains and sports injury, and localised soft tissue rheumatism, including tendinitis and bursitis.

ACTIVE INGREDIENT
Diclofenac diethylamine 11.6 mgg

DIRECTIONS FOR USE
Rub gently into the affected area 3 or 4 times daily. Do not
use for more than 2 weeks except on medical advice.

WARNINGS
Do not use Voltaren Emulgel:
On children under 12 years
If you are pregnant or breastfeeding
If you are allergic to
diclofenac, aspirin, any other anti-inflammatory medicines
or pain relievers
If tube seal is broken or missing
Stop use and see your doctor immediately if:
You experience an allergic reaction.

While using this product:
Unless a doctor or pharmacist has told you to, do not
use this product with other medicines that you are taking
regularly
For external use only
Avoid contact with eyes.
Contains isopropyl alcohol as a preservative.
Contains benzoates.

OTHER INFORMATION
Store below 30C.
name: Voltaren Emulgel No Mess 75G
